description.raw:
in the top directory.

Successive calls to reboot don't work in SoftLayer, even it the machine has rebooted

The call used is "rebootDefault" http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Hardware_Server

But I could have used:
* poweCycle
* powerOff/powerOn
* rebootHard
* rebootSoft

I am not sure which corresponds to the desired ipmi reboot

It seems to take a long time before being able to issue a reboot command, long after the machine is back.

title.raw: A script called "reboot_loop" that reboots a machine (behind a router) in a loop
